thread.title: Public Transport in right direction – Len Brown
thread.title_full: Public Transport in right direction – Len Brown

title: Public Transport in right direction – Len Brown
text:
Public Transport in right direction – Len Brown 
  9:51 a.m. 
Len Brown (File) 
Auckland's mayor believes the Government's heading in the right direction with its focus on public transport for the city. 
Auckland will get around a third of the $14 billion allocated for transport projects nationwide. 
Mayor Len Brown says the Government's cottoning on to council's priorities. 
"Our council is now spending 50 percent of its transport funding on public transport and active transport. The Government is heading towards that type of commitment but not quite there yet," he says. 
RadioLIVE
